body_content.explanation: a structure containing hollow parts that is designed to encourage bees and other insects to make nests:
examples: We have a bee house that is essentially holes drilled deep into a block of wood.
Bee hotels, made of hollow sticks and designed to encourage nesting by wild bees, are very often built into the schemes.
The children built a bug hotel for all the insects that came to visit the garden.
Collect empty containers from your home to make a bug house.
